## GetRemoveButtonOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GetRemoveButtonOptions<GElement extends HTMLElement = any, GItem = any> extends HTMLProps<GElement> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disabled](./multishift.getremovebuttonoptions.disabled.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Prevents this from being selected. |
